names.english: gentiana macrophylla and atractylodes macrocephalla pill
names.commonEnglish: Gentiana Macrophylla and Atractylodes Macrocephala Pill

actions: Expels Wind-Dampness, clears Deficiency Heat, moistens the Intestines and unblocks the bowels.
Breaks up Blood Stasis, activates Blood circulation, moistens the Intestines, unblocks the bowels and drains abscesses.
Dispels Phlegm, dissipates clumps, reduces swellings and unblocks the bowels.
Cools the Blood, stops bleeding, clears Toxic Heat, astringes fluids and generates flesh.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
With Chao Zhi Shi, for Spleen Deficiency with Qi Stagnation with anorexia, epigastric focal distention and fullness.
Breaks up Stagnant Qi, reduces accumulation, descends Qi, unblocks the bowels, removes Stagnant Food, transforms Phlegm, reduces distention and resolves hardenings.
With Bai Zhu, for distention in the epigastrium and abdomen due to Spleen and Stomach Deficiency with Food Stagnation.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and drains Kidney Fire.
With Bai Zhu, for Spleen Deficiency leading to accumulation of Dampness with urinary difficulty, loose stools, diarrhea, Milky Lin or vaginal discharge.

syndromes: Fluid Deficiency in the Large Intestine

symptoms: Hemorrhoids with bleeding of fresh red Blood that may precede or follow defecation
If bleeding precedes defecation, it may be copious and forcefully ejected from the anus
The hemorrhoids may protrude, but are easily reduced
There may be pain, distention and/or fullness with defecation
Knotted constipation or bowel movements once a day
